Reviews.Title: Super
Reviews.Author: Laura G.
Reviews.Content: I have had this PC for a couple weeks and I love it! The finger scan for passwords, fantastic. I have not mastered the Leap Motion but I am working on it. I was so worried about Windows 8, with all the reviews saying they hate it. But I am finding I love it too. My last HP laptop lasted 7 years and is still running just slow. Hoping this one lasts as long. The easy transfer program for transfer of files is great. I bought the transfer cord and it's working out.

Reviews.Title: Bought it for my husband for Christmas
Reviews.Author: Debora Hanssen
Reviews.Content: It was the worst gift I've ever given him!  He has a laptop and the Windows 8 really only seems to work well with the touch screen computers.  It's been about 5 months now and we are about ready to toss this piece of junk out and buy a new one.  Last night while he was doing some work remotely, the computer screen went completely blank and he hasn't been able to get it back up since.  I think it's giving me a bigger headache because I have to hear him complain NONSTOP about what a big, expensive piece of garbage this computer is!!!  BE CAUTIOUS BEFORE PURCHASING!!

Reviews.Title: Good For About Two Months
Reviews.Author: Sherma Cools
Reviews.Content: This computer was great for  about two months then...bam! its goes to crap.The Plus, the fingerprint sign in and the smart pass for websites is cool. Smart pass is assigning a website to a finger. For instance, my pointer finger pulls up my email webpage, my middle pulls up my amazon webpage and so forth.However, as I currently type, I am packaging the laptop to send back to hp to fix because after updating windows 8 the whole thing crashed.  the screen went black and never came back on again even though the power button is on and the charger light is lit. I tried to return to amazon but i was a month past the window of return. My theory is, if this is the trouble i'm getting this early in the game then i would hate to think of what waits for me down the line.I would suggest you get another laptop period.

Reviews.Title: Screen + Operating System
Reviews.Author: Paula Mejia "-Paula"
Reviews.Content: Screen is way too big to be functional for a laptop. The operating system is Windows 8 which is really annoying and is full of a bunch of shortcuts that force you to use the applications that come with the computer.

Reviews.Title: HP Envy 17-j050us 17.3-Inch Laptop
Reviews.Author: Timothy Barnes
Reviews.Content: I bought this hp for my little sister who just started high school! she likes the backlit keys and the resolution. multitasking and speed is fine once you get there! she said it was a little slow to start

Reviews.Title: Laptop
Reviews.Author: Charles Brown
Reviews.Content: No communication. They said Eastern weather was to blame, what is wrong with telling the Customer instead of leaving him hanging? Bottom line, they sold something they did not have. I had to contact Amazon about this and after they contacted them I got answers.
